channel.title: Should i release?
channel.description:
i have a nubby source based off pkplanet (delta) i have a few things on it like...err... let me just make a list of things ive updated since i got it removed economy killing items from shops fixed the donator shop quantitys of items fixed smithing added over 10 new commands added over 10 custom items modified the pk rewards EXTREME modifications of npcdrops,npc hp and autospawn, so on so forth EXTREME modifcations of items.cfg made a donator zone made a commandcentre(staff zone) made crystal bow so it is carved out of a crystal elfs drop with a chisel to make crystal bow :P added visage on antifire shield to make dfs renamed the spirit shields made a custom abyssal demon boss (95% complete) made a zombie minigame with literally an armada of zombies (90% complete) made 4 custom spells added multi barrage no more same ip trading :) fixed godsword duping fixed duping in general no more syipkpker (only 3 logins from the same ip) kind of a fix, they can be stopped much easier changed some staff icons fixed some bugs with the bank pin systems fixed some rights for commands (yell,unmute, it was normal players, wtf?,item spawning, ect) added minion spawns to bandos gwd boss ALMOST added skillcape emotes remade some commands
what do you guys think? now im asking first because i want your opinion to say if i can almost call it my own source, so i wont get flamed, if its not enough, i will finish some things i am adding, add new things, so on so forth

item.title: Should i release?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

That’s your descision, just give credit where it’s due.

Read full topic

item.title: Should i release?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:365179”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=461385.msg3375290#msg3375290 date=1287546663]
Release what you want, does it really matter?
[/quote]
thats not what im asking, im asking, did i really add enough to call it my own source and release it?[/quote]Who the fuck cares, most of the stuff released isn’t there own work.

Read full topic

item.title: Should i release?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

i have a nubby source based off pkplanet (delta)
i have a few things on it like…err… let me just make a list of things ive updated since i got it
removed economy killing items from shops
fixed the donator shop quantitys of items
fixed smithing
added over 10 new commands
added over 10 custom items
modified the pk rewards
EXTREME modifications of npcdrops,npc hp and autospawn, so on so forth
EXTREME modifcations of items.cfg
made a donator zone
made a commandcentre(staff zone)
made crystal bow so it is carved out of a crystal elfs drop with a chisel to make crystal bow
added visage on antifire shield to make dfs
renamed the spirit shields
made a custom abyssal demon boss (95% complete)
made a zombie minigame with literally an armada of zombies (90% complete)
made 4 custom spells
added multi barrage
no more same ip trading
fixed godsword duping
fixed duping in general
no more syipkpker (only 3 logins from the same ip) kind of a fix, they can be stopped much easier
changed some staff icons
fixed some bugs with the bank pin systems
fixed some rights for commands (yell,unmute, it was normal players, wtf?,item spawning, ect)
added minion spawns to bandos gwd boss
ALMOST added skillcape emotes
remade some commands

what do you guys think?
now im asking first because i want your opinion to say if i can almost call it my own source, so i wont get flamed, if its not enough, i will finish some things i am adding, add new things, so on so forth

Read full topic
